name: Outyng
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riding cars
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Outyng connect people how need a ride with drivers.
To ride a car, "Riding cars" will need access to your profile information. So go to the home screen in your Alexa App and grant me permission. 
After enabling profile permissions in the Amazon Alexa app, you can then invoke the skill.
- To start the skill, you can say open Riding cars. and you will get the welcome prompt.
- if your device supports location, and you want to ride a car from your current location, you respond "yes" to the question "Do you need a ride from your current location".
- Else, you respond "No" and you say I need a ride from ... whatever.
- If you wanna know the cost of your trip, just say I am going to... whatever
- If you need help, you can say help.
- If you need to cancel or stop, you can say cancel
- You can say also goodbye.
Note: the addresses can be only in or around North bergen
